data.title: No change in Sanjay since 20 years: David Dhawan
data.meta_description: Director David Dhawan, who has worked with Sanjay Dutt in eight films, says the actor hasn't changed a bit over the past 20 years.
data.text:
Mumbai: Director David Dhawan, who has worked with Sanjay Dutt in eight films -- the latest being Rascals -- says the actor hasn't changed a bit over the past 20 years.

"He (Sanjay) is like an open book. He doesn't hide anything. I think he is basically the most simple guy I have ever seen. I started my career with him 20 years back as a director, and he is still the same. There is no change in him," Dhawan, who first worked with Sanjay in 1989 film Taaqatwar, told reporters.

Comedy film Rascals, which released on Thursday, also stars Ajay Devgn.

Sanjay, who considers Ajay as his younger brother, says even after delivering many hits, the latter is very down to earth.

"Ajay comes across as a very serious person which actually he is not. He is a very easy person. He has got a fantastic sense of humour. He is so grounded. He has given hits like Golmaal, Singham and I pray that Rascals is also a big hit...but all this doesn't affect him," said Sanjay.

Sanjay will next be seen as a villain in Karan Johar's Agneepath remake while Ajay is busy shooting Rohit Shetty's Bol Bachchan.
